original_text: And all the acts of his power and might, and the full account of the high honor of Mordecai, to which the king advanced him, are they not written in the Book of the Chronicles of the kings of Media and Persia?
korean_text: 왕의 능력 있는 모든 행적과 모르드개를 높여 존귀하게 한 사적이 메대와 바사 왕들의 일기에 기록되지 아니하였느냐

sentences.original_text: And all the acts of his power and might
and the full account of the high honor of Mordecai
sentences.korean_translation: 모르드개가 받은 높은 영예에 대한 모든 기록은

sentences.original_text: to which the king advanced him
sentences.korean_translation: 왕이 그를 높여준 그 일에 대하여는

sentences.original_text: in the Book of the Chronicles
of the kings of Media and Persia?
